lenders.name: V.VELU
lenders.loan_because: Iam poor medical student, Iam in final year, there is a financial problem, to overcome that iam doing online business, i want to upgrade membership, i return money in 45 days
lenders.occupational_info: paid to read programme, iam doing this work more than 6 months, i want to upgrade my membership kindly help me

lenders.name: Katie G
lenders.loan_because: it's such a small thing and it seems to make a difference

lenders.name: Jeremiah
lenders.loan_because:
It's an easy way to make a positive impact in the world.

It also helps you to save up money while you're loaning it out. You can't spend it until it's repaid, therefore you're 'saving' it.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get "the seed money".
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a married mother with 3 children. I mostly work in direct sales. I just like helping people. We should do more to help others, here or there.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: 100% goes to the entrepreneur.  And because I trust Kiva.  Outstanding organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a hospital trying to find ways to save them money by keeping supply chain and service expenses low.  I manage & negotiate these types of contracts for the hospital.

lenders.name: Mr. Long
lenders.loan_because: We wanted to help others, one step at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach sixth grade.  My sixth graders are very enthusiastic about helping to make our world a better place, so we are trying to do whatever we can.

lenders.name: Ruth & Trevor
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is a worthwhile enterprise.  As a retired ex small business owner I understand the difficulties at times with cash flow.   I have been using profits from the Ebay sale of my collection of novels and stamps which were part of a bequest to fund my donations.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: When I struggled to make a life change, others lent me a hand. Now I am lucky to have the opportunity to do the same for someone else. If everyone were to share, there would be enough for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel to different schools and work with children of all ages. I work mostly with children that have disabilities, emotional problems or difficulty learning.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: It makes the world a little bit better

lenders.name: Andre
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a superb way to support peoples entrepreneurial endeavors and allow them to create their own better future
lenders.occupational_info: I am making sure that the non-for-profit I work for implements all its actions to achieve a maximum impact to support the improvement of this world

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I have a reasonable loan to pay for my home; I'm hopeful to be helping people who wouldn't otherwise be able to obtain such loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on software.

lenders.name: Carlijn
lenders.loan_because: I have great admiration for all the men and ladies who take the intiative and work hard to make a better life for themselves, their family, and their customers!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Dutch government, to make new fair laws.

lenders.name: Meinaart
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to improve their lives and stimulate entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I create online games and websites for big brands.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: I know that loans can help people become more successful in their businesses and I want to help with that.
lenders.occupational_info:
I buy houses that need fixing up, repair them and then rent them out.
I also do many crafts, including making soaps, lotions, lip balms, bath salts, candles, knitting, crocheting, making hamacas, etc.

lenders.name: Renée
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower people and help them to achieve their goals and dreams.

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lenders.name: Hollie
lenders.loan_because: Kiva enables people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: money needs to be circulated.

lenders.name: Dave and Karen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to improve their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide money for people to buy houses.

lenders.name: Stig
lenders.loan_because: When supporting common charity organizations, your gift will not always reach the people it was intended for. Thanks to Kiva, I can direct my support to named people/groups I judge to be trustable and give them "help to self help". Since it is a borrow-repay system, my initial support money hopefully can be "recycled" as new loans.

lenders.name: Ian and Lily Rose
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others that don't have as much as we have.
lenders.occupational_info: We work everyday to learn what mom teaches us and to grow in our family's love.

lenders.name: Barbara & Rick
lenders.loan_because: We support the KIVA initiative as Christmas gifts - donations made to KIVA in honor of our friends at Christmas time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a choral director and my husband is a manager of a major information technology company.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in the world....
lenders.occupational_info: I lead a worldwide purchasing team for a Fortune 500 company in the US

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: the help that we received made a big difference to our lives, and now we can help too.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to need little, and others have little, except the will to succeed.

lenders.name: Kym
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to have a dream and a strong drive to achieve.  In my case, I applied for funding and was told I met every criteria, except there were no resources to help me.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach healthcare software to clinicians in the military and private sector.

lenders.name: Taryn
lenders.loan_because: I know what its like to really need money, and I know how much a loan from friends can mean.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computers play nice together.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: thanks to help I've received, I am able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a hunger relief charity.

lenders.name: Haworth
lenders.loan_because: I believe that anyone that has a GOOD DREAM should have a GOOD CHANCE at realizing that dream.

lenders.name: Miata
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with students all over the world wanting to achieve their educational goals through test prep

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of this organization! I've been to several developing nations and I want to be part of building financial stability for families.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to travel all around the world and I see tremendous value in local entrepreneurs. Good Luck with your dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: brand marketing for an international company

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I want to help even the economic playing field around the workd.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a university.

lenders.name: Krunzy.com
lenders.loan_because:
At Krunzy.com we respect the work Kiva is doing.  It is because of this we lend and participate.

We balance real life and gaming life and this is proof.
lenders.occupational_info: Gaming website

lenders.name: Jere
lenders.loan_because: We should all be helping each other along in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I ask people to help other people.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: it's an incredibly easy way to empower people and do some good in the world.

lenders.name: malgorzata
lenders.loan_because: Because I am able to.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower those who do not have the means to achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I work for a promotional products company, but I returned to school in September to qualify for a Masters in Social Work program.  My ultimate goal is to get into disaster relief mental health.

lenders.name: Cecilie
lenders.loan_because: I think that if you have the chance to help someone, you should.. Just as a lot of people has helped me before, when I needed it.

lenders.name: Henry
lenders.loan_because: I believe in having a dream.  If someone has one, why not help make it happen?!
lenders.occupational_info: Independent consultant who works in the banking / payments industry.  Very interested in emerging micro-banking / technology - particularly that which is smart card / emerging technology enabled.

lenders.name: Edie and Denny
lenders.loan_because: We are Christian anti-hunger activists who feel called to end hunger and extreme poverty in our time.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping those around the world who have a passion for their trade and their families. As an entrepreneur myself, with those same goals, it brings me great joy to help those I would normally never come in contact with.
lenders.occupational_info: As a designer, I provide companies with logos, brochures, packaging, web sites and invitations.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the value of a helping hand on a person-to-person basis
lenders.occupational_info: my job enables me to help people connect with other cultures

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to exercise charitable giving because it empowers people and puts them on a path towards self-sufficiency.
lenders.occupational_info:
I previously worked with Republican political candidates at all levels, helping them win election to public office and helping to shape them to be responsible and successful public servants.

Currently I work as a consultant to various individuals and organizations.

I'm also a part time law school student.

lenders.name: Ella
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference and I hope someone would do the same for me in the same situation
lenders.occupational_info: Managing 22 gas stations in British Columbia, Canada

lenders.name: mikeyames
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Justice.  I think microfinance helps the world to operate in the way the world is intended to work.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell stories for people who are helping others.  I tell the story well and raise money so that the people who are helping others can continue.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky to have the basic necessities that so many lack. I want to help give others opportunity to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an engineering company helping to acquire land for projects to be built on, such as electrical transmission lines and roads.

lenders.name: Caren
lenders.loan_because: I received Kiva as a gift and find it a wonderful way to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Gaiam: Founded in Boulder, Colorado in 1988, Gaiam is a provider of information, goods and services to customers who value the environment, a sustainable economy, healthy lifestyles, alternative healthcare and personal development.

lenders.name: Devin
lenders.loan_because: We all should

lenders.name: Mel
lenders.loan_because: hard work, ambition and awareness of local (or global) desires and demands should be given the opportunity to build, wherever it occurs. And because local, home grown businesses are the most sustainable.
lenders.occupational_info: Frighteningly dull.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I understand how challenging life can be.  I have been self-employed myself.  Had I had this opportunity, I think it may have been easier.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large satellite entertainment company.  I talk on the phone and help customers with technical and financial challenges.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to have had the opportunity to work my way up from nothing; I've traveled extensively in Central and South America, and I'd like to help some of the people I met.
lenders.occupational_info: I design systems for buildings; heating, cooling, electrical

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: With many giving little we can do so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with many other people to find new medicines that will treat cancer.

lenders.name: EDGARDO MORAN
lenders.loan_because: I want to create an opportunity for people in need to become the writers of their own destiny, and  as a way to give back to life for what life  has given me.
lenders.occupational_info: I supply the Federal Government with Technology and Support.

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.occupational_info: I take articles written by doctors and rewrite them to make them easier to understand.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my kids to think globally and remember their blessings.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: mike
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. I live in a developing country and I see people struggling every day to manage their small businesses and make ends meet. The small things you can do for these people can make a big difference in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a software development center in Costa Rica, test software and sell application development services to US clients. But in my free time I can be found in the rainforest communities of rural Costa Rica hanging out with the locals or watching monkeys and toucans in the rainforest.

lenders.name: Kakee
lenders.loan_because: I've slowed down my Christmas gift giving because I think we all have more than we need here at home, and well intended gifts tend to join piles of useless excess. I put the gift money into loans for people who can really use it, and everyone feels good about that! While old gifts get put in the back of closets, Kiva loans can be repaid and reloaned many times to many people.

lenders.name: christine
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the open heart surgery team

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: It' s one way to do my part in helping others
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites, paint pictures and draw comics.  I also have 2 podcasts (like a tiny radio show on the Internet).

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance has been shown to work.

lenders.name: Kiva B.
lenders.loan_because: People need it.
lenders.occupational_info:
In Canada, I go to school from 9 to 3:30 every weekday.
In school, I like to do art and to read and write.

lenders.name: Glenn Watkins
lenders.loan_because: Connecting and empowering people around the world makes a difference to all of our lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur and Chief Executive of inVenturez - strategy execution using community, technology, online.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I give because I can. I have been blessed with health, family and friends. Working in health care has taught me that there is no time like today to start  making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the intensive care unit of  a hospital. I take care of the sickest patients in the hospital and have been doing this for 30 years. I love helping people get well and learn about health.

lenders.name: Roxanne, Dave & Kennedy
lenders.loan_because: Just trying to help.

lenders.name: yvette and matt
lenders.loan_because: we are suppose to help others

lenders.name: Shana

lenders.occupational_info: Receptionist

lenders.name: Padric
lenders.loan_because: What goes around comes around.

lenders.name: Nancy

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that provides housing to low income seniors in Edmonton.  We provide housing to people that deserve a better quality of life than they can afford which allows them to have dignity as they age within our community.

lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I are research scientists who study brain injury and brain development.

lenders.occupational_info: I do, probably, the same things you do. Clean the house, love the kids, rejoice when my husband comes home.

lenders.name: Kellie

lenders.name: Sherrye

lenders.occupational_info: I visit ill and dying people in the hospital and help them and their families deal with the "new normal" that illness has brought to their lives.

lenders.name: victoria
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to be self sufficient
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase fabrics from a global market to be used to decorate homes...I do adminstrative duties as well...I assist individuals in selection of fabrics for various projects.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Dave

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the credit card industry. My company reduces the cost of accepting credit for our customers.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the development and manufacturing of semiconductor microelectronics.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I support the micro loan concept and recognize a little can go a long way.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We were told to strive for life and all that is good on this planet. If we would be still and listen, we would surely hear the prayer of every need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a manager of a helpdesk for my company. We help people with their technology problems in person, by email and by phone.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women around the world in order to make this a safer and healthier planet.

lenders.occupational_info: We are a  high school geography class  from Thornton, Colorado USA.

lenders.name: Hilda
lenders.loan_because:
People's stories inspire me and I believe everyone makes a difference.
I´ve just finished reading The Soul of Money by Lynne Twist.  What I had expected, was to learn more about money; what I had not expected was being profoundly touched by this wise woman.  Highly recommended.
Visit her Web site at  www.soulofmoney.org

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: What better way to 'be the change' than to empower people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Suryo
lenders.loan_because: I believe that empowering people to help themselves is a fast way to stability and health in a developing country.

BodyTalk System is a comprehensive energy medicine that is safe, effective and fast. IT has a "FAST AID" component that is 
very useful in health emergencies. I teach this system ALL over the world! Ask me about it. suryo@bodytalkwa.com

lenders.name: Mahomed L
lenders.loan_because: To help others improve their circumstances through their own initiative.

lenders.name: Keegan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in peoples lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I study earthquakes.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance intrigues me.
lenders.occupational_info: I do all the odd jobs, keep track of projects, and make sure that everyone else on my team can do their job without impediments.

lenders.name: Communality
lenders.loan_because: We are involved with the work of Kiva because we believe that what they are doing is a wonderful "experiment in truth (to borrow M. Gandhi's phrase)."
lenders.occupational_info: Founded in 1998, in Lexington, Kentucky (USA), Communality is a community of faith and action on a journey to try to link the historical Christian faith with the realities of our contemporary society.  As a part of the growing "neo-monastic" movement in the US, we try to provide a safe place for people to explore faith that is anchored in long-term commitment to one another and the determination to work for reconciliation amidst the beauty & brokenness within us and the world and world systems around us.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: why not?

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who may be less fortunate live happy and successful lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the secretary to a bankruptcy attorney.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: This kind of solidarity is essential to the survival of the species!!

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to support those less fortunate... and such a small amount for us means so much for these entrepreneurs in other countries!

lenders.name: Joann & Karin
lenders.loan_because: We gave this as the gift that keeps on giving on behalf of our Urgent Care Doctors who give so much every day!  Merry Christmas!

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: we all need eachother
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital supporting laboring women for the delivery of their babies.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: a debt was paid for me

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I believe strongly in microlending and helping those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Professional who wants to build systems to support Micro Lending.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: Many years ago, when I was young and pregnant, I lived in the back of a car and had to steal for food.  I know how it feels to dig yourself out of that hole and become self supporting.  I am so blessed and joyful to be able to now help others do the same thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the computer data base and all  paperwork for a school.  I am also a Reiki Master.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: who would not, if they were able ...

lenders.name: Jean-Francois
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in developing countries and I remember the reality of the daily struggle in less fortunate circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I build web sites.

lenders.name: Jerimee
lenders.occupational_info: I use web technology to promote compassion and justice.

lenders.name: Random Lender
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: Writer

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we all can end poverty with little out of our own pocket and that micro lending is the best tool to do it. We can empower people to end their own poverty and become independent.
lenders.occupational_info: Business Finance

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I would like entrepreneurs in less advantaged situations  to have a chance to make a good life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate broker now, but had been a banker for 33 years. I understand the concept and the success of microlending.

lenders.name: Elaine

lenders.occupational_info: I taught English to minor league baseball players. I am now retired.

lenders.name: Arif
lenders.loan_because: Best way to help people in need, allow them to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: Develop new kitchen products and concepts

lenders.name: Darin
lenders.loan_because: If i can help another person, even in a little way, I beleive it makes the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Many peaple around the world are HIV positive.  There are always new drug treatments being formulated and these drugs have to go through a trial period before they are approved for general use.  I help in coordinating these trials between the clinic I work for and the drug manufaturer.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: Having your own business creates pride and honor and gives people more options in life.

lenders.name: Three Generations
lenders.loan_because: We've seen over the years the difference our Kiva donations make to people. Sharing what we have to help others is important to us.

lenders.name: nicolas
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way to get rid of poverty in developing countries. This is the theory of bioeconomy.
